Using Process Items

Change requests, requirements, and tasks can all serve as process items. Using process items enables you to link and track changes made to your files, even when you and other members of your development team are not required to use process rules.

When you add files or check them in, you can indicate that the new files or file revisions are to be linked and pinned to a specific process item. This action pins one end of the link to the new file or revision and the other end to the process item. At the same time, you can mark the process item as fixed, finished, or complete.

To specify a process item:

  • Pre-select it from the application's main window. See Pre-Selecting an Active Process Item.

  • Select a process item from the Add Files or Check In Files dialog. See Linking New Files to Process Items and Linking File Revisions to Process Items.
